eos Saser_Kangri ( or Sasir Kangri ) is the highest peak in the Saser Muztagh , the easternmost subrange of the Karakoram range in India .
eos Saser_Kangri ( or Sasir Kangri ) is the highest peak in the Saser Muztagh , the easternmost subrange of the Karakoram range in India . Saser_Kangri is the 35th highest independent peak in the world .
eos I at 7,672 metres ( 25,170 feet ) * Saser Kangri II East at 7,518 metres ( 24,665 feet ) ; West at 7,500 metres * Saser Kangri III at 7,495 metres ( 24,590 feet ) * Saser Kangri IV at 7,416 metres ( 24,330 feet )
eos * Saser Kangri IV at 7,416 metres ( 24,330 feet ) Saser_Kangri lies toward the northwestern end of the Saser Muztagh , at the head of the North Shukpa Kunchang Glacier , a major glacier which drains the eastern slopes of the group . The Sakang and Pukpoche Glaciers head on the western side of the group , and drain into the Nubra River . Early exploration and climbing attempts of
eos Early European exploration included a visit in 1909 by famed explorer T G. Longstaff , along with Arthur Neve and A M. Slingsby . However , visits and failed climbing attempts by multiple groups on the western side over the period 1922 - 1970 showed that the western side was surprisingly difficult . eos Schneeberg_Alps is a distinctive limestone massif with steep slopes on three sides . Schneeberg_Alps is one of the Northern Calcareous Alps in the borderland between Lower Austria and Styria , in the eastern part of Austria .
eos Schneeberg_Alps and the Rax ( 2007 m ) , some 13 km to the south - west , are collectively considered the Viennese Hausberge ( local mountains ) . eos The first ascent was on 16 august 1861 by Leslie Stephen , Ulrich Kaufmann , Christian Michel and Peter Michel . Their route of ascent , via the upper Schreck Couloir to the Schrecksattel and then by the south - east ridge , was the normal route for the following fifty years , but is now seldom used .
eos The first ascent was on 16 august 1861 by Leslie Stephen , Ulrich Kaufmann , Christian Michel and Peter Michel . Their route of ascent , via the upper Schreck Couloir to the Schrecksattel and then by the south - east ridge , was the normal route for the following fifty years , but is now seldom used . Schreckhorn had been attempted several times before this , most notably by the Swiss naturalist Joseph Hugi in 1828 (
eos Schreckhorn had been attempted several times before this , most notably by the Swiss naturalist Joseph Hugi in 1828 ( Schreckhorn Hugisattel is named after him ) and the guided party of Pierre Jean Édouard Desor ( a Swiss geologist ) in 1842 . ` The ambition of hoisting the first flag on the Schreckhorn , the one big Bernese summit which was untrodden , was far too obvious for us to resist ' , Desor later wrote , but they climbed a secondary summit of the Lauteraarhorn by mistake . The first ascent by the south - west ridge ( AD + ) - the normal route by which
eos The north - west ridge ( the Andersongrat , AD ) was first climbed by John Stafford Anderson and George Percival Baker , with guides Ulrich Almer and Aloys Pollinger on 7 august 1883 . The Strahlegg Hut , destroyed by an avalanche , has been replaced by the Schreckhorn Hut ( 2,520 m ) .

eos Semeru also Gunung Semeru - is the tallest mountain on the island of Java and one of its most active volcanoes . Known also as Mahameru ( Great Mountain ) ,
eos Semeru rises abruptly above the coastal plains of eastern Java . Maars containing crater lakes have formed along a line through the summit .
eos Maars containing crater lakes have formed along a line through the summit . Semeru lies at the south end of the Tengger Volcanic Complex .
eos Since 1818 , at least 55 eruptions have been recorded ( 10 of which resulted in fatalities ) consisting of both lava flows and pyroclastic flows . Moderate explosive eruptions ( VEI 2 - 3 ) have also been recorded with some regularity .
eos Semeru has been in a state of near - constant eruption from 1967 to the present . At times , small eruptions happen every 10 minutes or so .

eos Shishapangma is the highest peak in the Jugal Himal , which is contiguous with , and often considered a part of , the Langtang Himal . eos The combined Jugal / Langtang Himal straddles the Tibet / Nepal border . Since Shishapangma is on the dry north side of the Himalayan crest , and further away from the lower terrain of Nepal , Shishapangma has somewhat less dramatic vertical relief than most other major Himalayan peaks .

eos Shkhara is the highest point in the nation of Georgia . Located in the Svaneti region along the Russian frontier ,
eos Located in the Svaneti region along the Russian frontier , Shkhara lies north of the city of Kutaisi , Georgia 's second largest city . The summit lies in the central part of the Greater Caucasus Mountain Range , to the south - east of Mount Elbrus , Europe 's highest mountain .
eos The summit lies in the central part of the Greater Caucasus Mountain Range , to the south - east of Mount Elbrus , Europe 's highest mountain . Shkhara is the third highest peak in the Caucasus , just behind Dykh - Tau .
eos Shkhara is the high point and the eastern anchor of a massif known as the Bezingi ( or Bezengi ) Wall , a long ridge .
eos Wall , a long ridge . Shkhara is a large , steep peak in a heavily glaciated region , and Shkhara presents serious challenges to mountaineers .
eos Shkhara North Face ( on the Russian side ) is high and contains several classic difficult routes . The significant subsummit Shkhara West , 5068 m , is a climbing objective in its own right , and a traverse of the entire Bezingi Wall is considered ` ` Europe 's longest , most arduous , and most committing expedition . ''
eos The significant subsummit Shkhara West , 5068 m , is a climbing objective in its own right , and a traverse of the entire Bezingi Wall is considered ` ` Europe 's longest , most arduous , and most committing expedition . eos Climbing on the Russian side of the massif is facilitated by the presence of the Bezengi Camp , a well - equipped base camp featuring huts , cottages , a library , and a sauna . The Georgian side is more remote , and persistent reports of banditry have kept climbers away .

eos Signalkuppe is named after ` the Signal ' , a prominent gendarme atop the east ridge . eos Skyang_Kangri , or Staircase Peak , is a high peak of the Baltoro Muztagh , a subrange of the Karakoram range .
eos Skyang_Kangri lies on the Pakistan - China border , about 7 km northeast of K2 , the world 's second - highest mountain . The name ` ` Staircase Peak '' refers to the East Ridge , which resembles a giant staircase with five steps .
eos They attempted the East Ridge , as did a subsequent failed attempt in 1975 , in which one climber died and one had to be evacuated by helicopter . eos Snaefellsjoekull is situated on the most western part of the Snæfellsnes peninsula in Iceland . eos Snow_Dome_Canada is a mountain located on the Continental Divide in the Columbia Icefield of Jasper National Park , on the border between Alberta and British Columbia , Canada . Snow_Dome_Canada was named in 1898 by J Norman Collie because Snow_Dome_Canada snow - capped massif resembles a dome . Snow_Dome_Canada , reaching a height of 3,456 m ( 11,339 ft ) , is a hydrological apex of North America as water from
eos Snow_Dome_Canada was named in 1898 by J Norman Collie because Snow_Dome_Canada snow - capped massif resembles a dome . Snow_Dome_Canada , reaching a height of 3,456 m ( 11,339 ft ) , is a hydrological apex of North America as water from Snow_Dome_Canada flows into rivers that drain into the Pacific Ocean ( via the Columbia River ) , the Arctic Ocean ( via the Athabasca River ) , and Hudson Bay ( via the North Saskatchewan River ) . eos Alternately , Split_Mountain has been called Southeast Palisade or South Palisade . The two toned appearance of Split_Mountain eastern face is created by a roof pendant of darker colored granodiorite atop a lighter colored body of leucogranite .

eos From atop Telescope_Peak one can see for over one hundred miles in many directions , including west across Panamint Valley to Mount Whitney and the Sierra Nevada in California , and east across the Badwater Basin in Death Valley ( the lowest point in North America ) to Charleston Peak in the Spring Mountains of Nevada . Hiking trails from the base to the summit total 7 miles .
eos Hiking trails from the base to the summit total 7 miles . Telescope_Peak was named for the great distance visible from the summit .
eos Telescope_Peak was named for the great distance visible from the summit . Telescope_Peak is also notable for having one of the greatest vertical rises above local terrain of any mountain in the contiguous United States .

eos The_Brocken , or Blocksberg , is the highest peak in the Harz Mountains in Germany and also the highest peak of northern Germany ; The_Brocken is located between the rivers Weser and Elbe . Although The_Brocken altitude ( 1,141 metres ) is below alpine dimensions , The_Brocken microclimate resembles that of mountains of 2000 m altitude . eos The_Brocken tends to have a snow cover from september to May , and mists and fogs shroud The_Brocken up to 300 days of the year . The mean annual temperature is only 2.9 ° C .
eos The_Brocken tends to have a snow cover from september to May , and mists and fogs shroud The_Brocken up to 300 days of the year . The mean annual temperature is only 2.9 ° C . eos Triple_Divide_Peak ( 8,020 ft / 2,444 m ) is located in Glacier National Park , Montana , United States .
eos Triple_Divide_Peak ( 8,020 ft / 2,444 m ) is located in Glacier National Park , Montana , United States . Triple_Divide_Peak is the hydrologic apex of the North American continent . The Continental ( Great ) Divide and the Laurentian Divide meet at the summit of
eos Triple_Divide_Peak is the hydrologic apex of the North American continent . The Continental ( Great ) Divide and the Laurentian Divide meet at the summit of Triple_Divide_Peak , and all water that falls at this point can flow to any of the Pacific , Arctic or the Atlantic Oceans . eos Truchas_Peak is a small north - south trending massif with four indentifiable summits , North Truchas Peak , Middle Truchas Peak , ` ` Medio Truchas Peak '' ( unofficial name ) , and South Truchas Peak , the highest summit . Of the three subsidiary summits , only North Truchas Peak , 13,024 ft ( 3,970 m ) has enough topographic prominence ( about 650 ft/200 m ) to be considered an independent peak .

eos Like all peaks in the San Juan Mountains , Uncompahgre_Peak is of volcanic origin , but Uncompahgre_Peak is not a volcano . The rock is of poor quality for climbing , precluding an ascent of the north face . The most popular route for climbing

eos Wheeler_Peak_New_Mexico is the highest peak in the US state of New Mexico , with an elevation of 13,161 feet ( 4,011 m ) .
eos Wheeler_Peak_New_Mexico is the highest peak in the US state of New Mexico , with an elevation of 13,161 feet ( 4,011 m ) . Wheeler_Peak_New_Mexico is located in the northern part of the state , northeast of Taos .
eos Wheeler_Peak_New_Mexico lies in the Sangre de Cristo Mountains , the southernmost subrange of the Rocky Mountains . Named in honor of Major George Montague Wheeler ( 1832 - 1909 ) who for ten years led a party of surveyors and naturalists collecting geologic , biologic , planimetric and topographic data in New Mexico and six other southwestern states .

eos White_Mountain_California , or White Mountain Peak , is the highest peak of the White Mountains of the US state of California .
eos White_Mountain_California , or White Mountain Peak , is the highest peak of the White Mountains of the US state of California . White_Mountain_California is also the highest peak in Mono County and the third highest peak in the state , after Mount Whitney and Mount Williamson .
eos White_Mountain_California is also the highest peak in Mono County and the third highest peak in the state , after Mount Whitney and Mount Williamson . eos Wilson_Peak is a 14,017-foot ( 4,272 m ) mountain peak in the US state of Colorado . Wilson_Peak is located in the Lizard Head Wilderness of the Uncompahgre National Forest , in the southern San Juan Mountains .
eos Wilson_Peak is located in the Lizard Head Wilderness of the Uncompahgre National Forest , in the southern San Juan Mountains . Wilson_Peak is the highest point in San Miguel County .
eos Wilson_Peak is the highest point in San Miguel County . Wilson_Peak base is accessible by four wheel drive roads 11 miles ( 18 km ) west of Telluride , Colorado .
eos Wilson_Peak base is accessible by four wheel drive roads 11 miles ( 18 km ) west of Telluride , Colorado . Wilson_Peak is part of a compact range of mountains , the San Miguel Range often considered distinct from the wider San Juan Range . eos Adolf_Hitler was leader of the National Socialist German Workers Party ( Nationalsozialistische Deutsche Arbeiterpartei or NSDAP ) , better known as the Nazi Party . Adolf_Hitler gained power in a Germany facing crisis after World War I , using charismatic oratory and propaganda , appealing to economic need of the lower and middle classes , nationalism , anti - Semitism and anti - communism to establish a totalitarian or fascist dictatorship . With a restructured economy and rearmed military ,
eos With a restructured economy and rearmed military , Adolf_Hitler pursued an aggressive foreign policy with the intention of expanding German Lebensraum ( ` ` living space '' ) , which triggered World War II when Germany invaded Poland . eos Alan_Turing , OBE ( june 23 , 1912 - june 7 , 1954 ) , was an English mathematician , logician , and cryptographer .
eos Alan_Turing , OBE ( june 23 , 1912 - june 7 , 1954 ) , was an English mathematician , logician , and cryptographer . Alan_Turing is often considered to be the father ! of modern computer science .
eos Alan_Turing is often considered to be the father ! of modern computer science . Alan_Turing provided an influential formalisation of the concept of the algorithm and computation with the Turing machine , formulating the now widely accepted ` ` Turing '' version of the Church - Turing thesis , namely that any practical computing model has either the equivalent or a subset of the capabilities of a Turing machine . With the Turing test ,
eos Alan_Turing provided an influential formalisation of the concept of the algorithm and computation with the Turing machine , formulating the now widely accepted ` ` Turing '' version of the Church - Turing thesis , namely that any practical computing model has either the equivalent or a subset of the capabilities of a Turing machine . With the Turing test , Alan_Turing made a significant and characteristically provocative contribution to the debate regarding artificial intelligence : whether it will ever be possible to say that a machine is conscious and can think . During World War II ,
eos With the Turing test , Alan_Turing made a significant and characteristically provocative contribution to the debate regarding artificial intelligence : whether it will ever be possible to say that a machine is conscious and can think . During World War II , Alan_Turing worked at Bletchley Park , Britain 's codebreaking centre , and Alan_Turing was for a time head of Hut 8 , the section responsible for German Naval cryptanalysis .
eos During World War II , Alan_Turing worked at Bletchley Park , Britain 's codebreaking centre , and Alan_Turing was for a time head of Hut 8 , the section responsible for German Naval cryptanalysis . Alan_Turing devised a number of techniques for breaking German ciphers , including the method of the bombe , an electromechanical machine which could find settings for the Enigma machine . After the war ,
eos Alan_Turing devised a number of techniques for breaking German ciphers , including the method of the bombe , an electromechanical machine which could find settings for the Enigma machine . After the war , Alan_Turing worked at the National Physical Laboratory , creating one of the first designs for a stored - program computer , although it was never actually built . In 1947
eos In 1947 Alan_Turing moved to the University of Manchester to work , largely on software , on the Manchester Mark I then emerging as one of the world 's earliest true computers . In 1952 ,
eos I then emerging as one of the world 's earliest true computers . In 1952 , Alan_Turing was convicted of ` ` acts of gross indecency '' after admitting to a sexual relationship with a man in Manchester .
eos In 1952 , Alan_Turing was convicted of ` ` acts of gross indecency '' after admitting to a sexual relationship with a man in Manchester . Alan_Turing was placed on probation and required to undergo hormone therapy .

eos Three notable stages can be identified in Anthony_Giddens academic life . The first one involved outlining a new vision of what sociology is , presenting a theoretical and methodological understanding of that field , based on a critical reinterpretation of the classics .
eos The first one involved outlining a new vision of what sociology is , presenting a theoretical and methodological understanding of that field , based on a critical reinterpretation of the classics . eos King Hiero II , who was rumored to be Archimedes uncle , commissioned Archimedes to design and fabricate a new class of ships for his navy , which were crucial for the preservation of the ruling class in Syracuse . eos Hiero II had promised large caches of grain to the Romans in the north in return for peace . Faced with war when unable to present the promised amount , Hiero II commissioned Archimedes to develop a large luxury / supply / war barge in order to serve the changing requirements of his navy . eos ` ` He who is the beloved of the Gods who , in turn is his loving servant '' ) was the ruler of the Maurya Empire from 273 BC to 232 BC . After a number of military conquests , Ashoka_the_Great reigned over most of South Asia and beyond , from present - day Afghanistan and parts of Persia in the west , to Bengal and Assam in the east , and as far south as Mysore . eos A later convert to Buddhism , Ashoka_the_Great established monuments marking several significant sites in the life of Shakyamuni Buddha , and according to Buddhist tradition Ashoka_the_Great was closely involved in the preservation and transmission of Buddhism . eos Benito_Mussolini ( july 29 1883 - april 28 , 1945 ) was the Prime - Minister and dictator of Italy from 1922 until Benito_Mussolini overthrow in 1943 . eos Boudica ( also Boudicca , formerly better known as Boadicea ) ( d. 60/61 ) was a queen of the Brythonic Celtic Iceni people of Norfolk in Eastern Britain Boudica led a major uprising of the tribes against the occupying forces of the Roman Empire . eos ( d. 60/61 ) was a queen of the Brythonic Celtic Iceni people of Norfolk in Eastern Britain Boudica led a major uprising of the tribes against the occupying forces of the Roman Empire . Upon the death of Boudica husband Prasutagus , the Romans annexed his kingdom and brutally humiliated Boudica and Boudica daughters , spurring Boudica leadership of the revolt . In 60 or 61 , while governor Gaius Suetonius Paulinus was leading a campaign on the island of Anglesey in north Wales ,
eos Upon the death of Boudica husband Prasutagus , the Romans annexed his kingdom and brutally humiliated Boudica and Boudica daughters , spurring Boudica leadership of the revolt . In 60 or 61 , while governor Gaius Suetonius Paulinus was leading a campaign on the island of Anglesey in north Wales , Boudica led the Iceni , along with the Trinovantes and others , in a rebellion which destroyed the former Trinovantian capital and Roman colonia of Camulodunum ( Colchester ) , and routed the Roman Legio IX Hispana under Quintus Petillius Cerialis .
eos In 60 or 61 , while governor Gaius Suetonius Paulinus was leading a campaign on the island of Anglesey in north Wales , Boudica led the Iceni , along with the Trinovantes and others , in a rebellion which destroyed the former Trinovantian capital and Roman colonia of Camulodunum ( Colchester ) , and routed the Roman Legio IX Hispana under Quintus Petillius Cerialis . Boudica army then burned to the ground the twenty - year - old settlement of Londinium ( London ) and destroyed Verulamium ( St Albans ) , killing an estimated 70,000 - 80,000 people . Roman emperor Nero briefly considered withdrawing Roman forces from the island , but ultimately
eos Boudica army then burned to the ground the twenty - year - old settlement of Londinium ( London ) and destroyed Verulamium ( St Albans ) , killing an estimated 70,000 - 80,000 people . Roman emperor Nero briefly considered withdrawing Roman forces from the island , but ultimately Boudica was defeated at the Battle of Watling Street by the heavily outnumbered forces of governor Suetonius . eos Boudica army then burned to the ground the twenty - year - old settlement of Londinium ( London ) and destroyed Verulamium ( St Albans ) , killing an estimated 70,000 - 80,000 people . eos Roman emperor Nero briefly considered withdrawing Roman forces from the island , but ultimately Boudica was defeated at the Battle of Watling Street by the heavily outnumbered forces of governor Suetonius . The chronicles of these events , as recorded by the historians Tacitus and Dio Cassius , were rediscovered during the Renaissance and led to a resurgence of Boudica legendary fame during the Victorian era , when Queen Victoria was portrayed as Boudica ` ` namesake '' .

eos Huge new churches and palazzi were being built in Rome in the decades of the late 16th and early 17th centuries , and paintings were needed to fill them . The Counter - Reformation Church searched for authentic religious art with which to counter the threat of Protestantism , and for this task the artificial conventions of Mannerism , which had ruled art for almost a century , no longer seemed adequate .
eos The Counter - Reformation Church searched for authentic religious art with which to counter the threat of Protestantism , and for this task the artificial conventions of Mannerism , which had ruled art for almost a century , no longer seemed adequate . eos Famous and extremely influential while Caravaggio lived , Caravaggio was almost completely forgotten in the centuries after Caravaggio death , and it was only in the 20th century that Caravaggio importance to the development of Western art was rediscovered . Yet despite this Caravaggio influence on the common style which eventually emerged from the ruins of Mannerism , the new Baroque , was profound . eos Charlemagne ( 742 or 747 - 28 january 814 ) ( also Charles the Great ; from Latin , "" Latin : Carolus Magnus "" ) was the King of the Franks ( 768 - 814 ) who conquered Italy and took the Iron Crown of Lombardy in 774 and , on a visit to Rome in 800 , was crowned "" Latin : imperator Romanorum "" ( ` ` Emperor of the Romans '' ) by Pope Leo III on Christmas Day , presaging the revival of the Roman imperial tradition in the West in the form of the Holy Roman Empire . By
eos Charlemagne ( 742 or 747 - 28 january 814 ) ( also Charles the Great ; from Latin , "" Latin : Carolus Magnus "" ) was the King of the Franks ( 768 - 814 ) who conquered Italy and took the Iron Crown of Lombardy in 774 and , on a visit to Rome in 800 , was crowned "" Latin : imperator Romanorum "" ( ` ` Emperor of the Romans '' ) by Pope Leo III on Christmas Day , presaging the revival of the Roman imperial tradition in the West in the form of the Holy Roman Empire . eos Carolus Magnus "" ) was the King of the Franks ( 768 - 814 ) who conquered Italy and took the Iron Crown of Lombardy in 774 and , on a visit to Rome in 800 , was crowned "" Latin : imperator Romanorum "" ( ` ` Emperor of the Romans '' ) by Pope Leo III on Christmas Day , presaging the revival of the Roman imperial tradition in the West in the form of the Holy Roman Empire . By Charlemagne foreign conquests and internal reforms , Charlemagne helped define Western Europe and the Middle Ages .

eos Charles_Darwin FRS ( 12 february 1809 - 19 april 1882 ) was an English naturalist
eos Charles_Darwin FRS ( 12 february 1809 - 19 april 1882 ) was an English naturalist Charles_Darwin achieved lasting fame by producing considerable evidence that species originated through evolutionary change , at the same time proposing the scientific theory that natural selection is the mechanism by which such change occurs . This theory is now considered a cornerstone of biology , and has significantly affected other disciplines such as philosophy , psychology and anthropology .

eos Although never able to achieve the same impact in the United States as Cliff_Richard had in Britain , in spite of having several chart hits there , Cliff_Richard has remained a popular music , film , and television personality in the UK and Cliff_Richard also retains a following in several other countries . The maps David_Thompson_explorer made of the Columbia River basin east of the Cascade Mountains were of such high quality and detail that they continued to be regarded as authoritative well into the mid-20th century . eos The maps David_Thompson_explorer made of the Columbia River basin east of the Cascade Mountains were of such high quality and detail that they continued to be regarded as authoritative well into the mid-20th century . eos Edward_Jenner is famous as the first doctor to introduce and study the smallpox vaccine . Edward_Jenner was elected Fellow of the Royal Society in 1788 , following a careful study combining observation , experiment and dissection into a description of the previously misunderstood life of the cuckoo in the nest .
eos Edward_Jenner was elected Fellow of the Royal Society in 1788 , following a careful study combining observation , experiment and dissection into a description of the previously misunderstood life of the cuckoo in the nest . Edward_Jenner description of the newly - hatched cuckoo pushing its host 's eggs and fledglings from the nest ( contrary to the existing belief that the adult cuckoo did it ) was only confirmed in the 20th century when photography became feasible . Having observed the behaviour ,
eos Having observed the behaviour , Edward_Jenner demonstrated an anatomical adaptation for it - the baby cuckoo has a depression in its back which is not present after 12 days of life , in which it cups eggs and other chicks to push them out of the nest . It had been assumed that the adult bird did this , but the adult does not remain in the area for sufficiently long .

eos Edward_Jenner findings were published in the Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society in 1787 . Some discrepancies in the paper are ascribed to Edward_Jenner nephew who is said to have made up some observations .

eos Elaine_Scarry ( born 30 june , 1946 ) , a professor of English and American Literature and Language , is the Walter M Cabot Professor of Aesthetics and the General Theory of Value at Harvard University .
eos Elaine_Scarry ( born 30 june , 1946 ) , a professor of English and American Literature and Language , is the Walter M Cabot Professor of Aesthetics and the General Theory of Value at Harvard University . Elaine_Scarry interests include Theory of Representation , the Language of Physical Pain and Structure of Verbal and Material Making in Art , Science and the Law .
eos Elaine_Scarry interests include Theory of Representation , the Language of Physical Pain and Structure of Verbal and Material Making in Art , Science and the Law . Elaine_Scarry is the author of The Body in Pain which is known as a definitive study of pain and inflicting pain .
eos Elaine_Scarry is the author of The Body in Pain which is known as a definitive study of pain and inflicting pain . Elaine_Scarry argues that physical pain leads to destruction and the unmaking of the human world , whereas human creation at the opposite end of the spectrum leads to the making of the world . As a writer and lecturer on civic questions ranging from plane crashes to nuclear weapons to the Patriot Act ,

eos In 1916 , this allowed the government to draft all able - bodied men into the armed services . eos ( c. 325 - c. 265 BC ) , a Greek mathematician ,
eos - c. 265 BC ) , a Greek mathematician , Euclid lived in Alexandria , Hellenistic Egypt , almost certainly during the reign of Ptolemy I ( 323 BC-283 BC ) , is often considered to be the ` ` father of geometry '' .
eos Euclid most popular work , Elements , is thought to be one of the most successful textbooks in the history of mathematics . Within it , the properties of geometrical objects are deduced from a small set of axioms , thereby founding the axiomatic method of mathematics . Although best - known for its geometric results , the Elements also includes various results in number theory , such as the connection between perfect numbers and Mersenne primes , the proof of the infinitude of prime numbers ,
eos Within it , the properties of geometrical objects are deduced from a small set of axioms , thereby founding the axiomatic method of mathematics . Although best - known for its geometric results , the Elements also includes various results in number theory , such as the connection between perfect numbers and Mersenne primes , the proof of the infinitude of prime numbers , Euclid lemma on factorization ( which lead to the fundamental theorem of arithmetic , on uniqueness of prime factorizations ) , and the Euclidean algorithm for finding the greatest common divisor of two numbers .
eos Although best - known for its geometric results , the Elements also includes various results in number theory , such as the connection between perfect numbers and Mersenne primes , the proof of the infinitude of prime numbers , Euclid lemma on factorization ( which lead to the fundamental theorem of arithmetic , on uniqueness of prime factorizations ) , and the Euclidean algorithm for finding the greatest common divisor of two numbers . Euclid also wrote works on perspective , conic sections , spherical geometry , and possibly quadric surfaces . Neither the year nor place of

Euclid also wrote works on perspective , conic sections , spherical geometry , and possibly quadric surfaces . eos Francis_Drake , Vice Admiral , ( c. 1540 - january 28 1596 ) was an English privateer , navigator , naval pioneer and raider , politician and civil engineer of the Elizabethan era , considered by many a pirate .
eos Francis_Drake , Vice Admiral , ( c. 1540 - january 28 1596 ) was an English privateer , navigator , naval pioneer and raider , politician and civil engineer of the Elizabethan era , considered by many a pirate . Francis_Drake was second - in - command of the English fleet against the Spanish Armada in 1588 .

eos Freeman_Dyson ( born december 15 , 1923 ) is an English - born physicist and mathematician , famous for Freeman_Dyson work in quantum mechanics , nuclear weapons design and policy , and for Freeman_Dyson serious theorizing in futurism and science fiction concepts , including the search for extraterrestrial intelligence . Freeman_Dyson is a lifelong opponent of nationalism , and proponent of nuclear disarmament and international cooperation .

eos Claudius Galenus of Pergamum ( 129 - 200 AD ) , better known in English as Galen , was an ancient Greek physician . The forename ` ` Claudius '' is absent in Greek texts ; it was first documented in texts from the Renaissance .

eos Guy_Fawkes ( april 13 1570 - january 31 1606 ) ,
eos Guy_Fawkes ( april 13 1570 - january 31 1606 ) , Guy_Fawkes was also known as Guido Fawkes , born in York , was an English soldier and member of a group of Roman Catholics who attempted to carry out the Gunpowder Plot on 5 november 1605 . The plot was an attempt to assassinate the Protestant King James I ( James VI of Scotland ) and the members of both houses of the Parliament of England , by blowing up Westminster Palace during the formal opening session of the 1605 Parliament , in which the king would address a joint assembly of both the House of Lords and the House of Commons .
eos The plot was an attempt to assassinate the Protestant King James I ( James VI of Scotland ) and the members of both houses of the Parliament of England , by blowing up Westminster Palace during the formal opening session of the 1605 Parliament , in which the king would address a joint assembly of both the House of Lords and the House of Commons . Guy_Fawkes was in large part responsible for the later stages of the plan 's execution .
eos Guy_Fawkes was in large part responsible for the later stages of the plan 's execution . Guy_Fawkes activities were detected , however , before the plan 's completion . Following a severe interrogation involving the use of torture , and a trial in Westminster Hall by Judge John Popham ,

eos Guy_Fawkes activities were detected , however , before the plan 's completion . Following a severe interrogation involving the use of torture , and a trial in Westminster Hall by Judge John Popham , Guy_Fawkes and Guy_Fawkes conspirators were executed for treason and attempted murder .

eos Harold_Bloom , PhD , ( born july 11 , 1930 ) is an American professor and prominent literary and cultural critic .
eos Harold_Bloom , PhD , ( born july 11 , 1930 ) is an American professor and prominent literary and cultural critic . Harold_Bloom defended 19th - century Romantic poets at a time when their reputations stood at a low ebb , Harold_Bloom has constructed controversial theories of poetic influence , and Harold_Bloom advocates an aesthetic approach to literature against Feminist , Marxist , New Historicist , Post - modernist , and other methods of academic literary criticism .

They included the several Acts which severed the English Church from the Roman Catholic Church and established Henry_VIII_of_England as the supreme head of the Church in England ; the Laws in Wales Acts 1535 - 1542 , which brought the law in Wales in line with that in England ; the Buggery Act 1533 , the first anti - sodomy enactment in England ; and the Witchcraft Act 1542 , which punished ` invoking or conjuring an evil spirit ' with death .

eos James_Clerk_Maxwell ( 13 june 1831 - 5 november 1879 ) was a Scottish mathematical physicist , born in Edinburgh .
eos James_Clerk_Maxwell ( 13 june 1831 - 5 november 1879 ) was a Scottish mathematical physicist , born in Edinburgh . James_Clerk_Maxwell formulated a set of equations expressing the basic laws of electricity and magnetism and James_Clerk_Maxwell developed the Maxwell distribution in the kinetic theory of gases .

eos James_Cook FRS RN ( october 27 , 1728 ( OS ) - february 14 , 1779 ) was an English explorer , navigator and cartographer . Ultimately rising to the rank of Captain in the Royal Navy ,
eos James_Cook FRS RN ( october 27 , 1728 ( OS ) - february 14 , 1779 ) was an English explorer , navigator and cartographer . Ultimately rising to the rank of Captain in the Royal Navy , James_Cook made three voyages to the Pacific Ocean , achieving the first European contact with the eastern coastline of Australia , the European discovery of the Hawaiian Islands , and the first recorded circumnavigation and mapping of Newfoundland and New Zealand . After service in the British merchant navy as a teenager ,
eos Ultimately rising to the rank of Captain in the Royal Navy , James_Cook made three voyages to the Pacific Ocean , achieving the first European contact with the eastern coastline of Australia , the European discovery of the Hawaiian Islands , and the first recorded circumnavigation and mapping of Newfoundland and New Zealand . After service in the British merchant navy as a teenager , James_Cook joined the Royal Navy in 1755 , seeing action in the Seven Years ' War , and subsequently surveying and mapping much of the entrance to the Saint Lawrence River during the siege of Quebec . eos After service in the British merchant navy as a teenager , James_Cook joined the Royal Navy in 1755 , seeing action in the Seven Years ' War , and subsequently surveying and mapping much of the entrance to the Saint Lawrence River during the siege of Quebec . This allowed General Wolfe to make his famous stealth attack on the Plains of Abraham , and helped to bring James_Cook to the attention of the Admiralty and Royal Society at a crucial moment both in James_Cook personal career and in the direction of British overseas discovery , and led to James_Cook commission as commander of the HM Bark Endeavour and the first of James_Cook three Pacific voyages in 1766 .

eos Johannes_Gutenberg ( c 1398 - c february 3 , 1468 ) was a German goldsmith and inventor
eos Johannes_Gutenberg ( c 1398 - c february 3 , 1468 ) was a German goldsmith and inventor Johannes_Gutenberg invented the European technology of printing with movable type in 1447 . Movable type technology was known in Korea and China by at least 1234 , but
eos Johannes_Gutenberg ( c 1398 - c february 3 , 1468 ) was a German goldsmith and inventor Johannes_Gutenberg invented the European technology of printing with movable type in 1447 . Movable type technology was known in Korea and China by at least 1234 , but Johannes_Gutenberg printing technology was most likely an independent invention .
eos Movable type technology was known in Korea and China by at least 1234 , but Johannes_Gutenberg printing technology was most likely an independent invention . Johannes_Gutenberg main contribution may have been in the combination of the use of movable type , the art of making such type , the use of oil - based ink , and the wooden printing press , which was presumably derived from the various presses in use at the time , including those for book - binding and those used in wine - making and in olive - oil production .
eos Johannes_Gutenberg technology for making type is traditionally considered to have included a type metal alloy and a mould for casting type accurately . The use of movable type constituted an improvement on the block printing already in use .
eos ( Similar techniques were used at the time for the production of printed textiles . ) Combining these elements into a production system permitted the rapid printing of written materials , which fed the information - hungry world of Renaissance Europe .
eos Combining these elements into a production system permitted the rapid printing of written materials , which fed the information - hungry world of Renaissance Europe . Johannes_Gutenberg printing technology rapidly spread throughout Europe and is generally thought to have been a key development leading to the European Renaissance . Consequently ,
eos Combining these elements into a production system permitted the rapid printing of written materials , which fed the information - hungry world of Renaissance Europe . Johannes_Gutenberg printing technology rapidly spread throughout Europe and is generally thought to have been a key development leading to the European Renaissance . eos Johannes_Kepler is best known for Johannes_Kepler laws of planetary motion , based on Johannes_Kepler works Astronomia nova , Harmonice Mundi and the textbook Epitome of Copernican Astronomy . Through Johannes_Kepler career Johannes_Kepler was a mathematics teacher at a Graz seminary school ( later the University of Graz , Austria ) , an assistant to Tycho Brahe , court mathematician to Emperor Rudolf II , mathematics teacher in Linz , Austria , and court astrologer to General Wallenstein .

eos John_Locke is equally important as a social contract theorist , as John_Locke developed an alternative to the Hobbesian state of nature and John_Locke argued a government could only be legitimate if it received the consent of the governed through a social contract and protected the natural rights of life , liberty , and estate . If such consent was not given , argued
eos argued a government could only be legitimate if it received the consent of the governed through a social contract and protected the natural rights of life , liberty , and estate . If such consent was not given , argued John_Locke , citizens had a right of rebellion .
eos If such consent was not given , argued John_Locke , citizens had a right of rebellion . John_Locke is one of the few major philosophers who became a minister of government .

eos John_Locke is one of the few major philosophers who became a minister of government . John_Maynard_Keynes is particularly remembered for advocating interventionist government policy , by which the government would use fiscal and monetary measures to mitigate the adverse effects of economic recessions , depressions and booms . eos John_Maynard_Keynes is particularly remembered for advocating interventionist government policy , by which the government would use fiscal and monetary measures to mitigate the adverse effects of economic recessions , depressions and booms . eos The movement took form from its third rise in the early 1740s with John_Wesley , along with others , itinerant field preaching and the subsequent founding of religious societies for the formation of believers . This was the first widely successful evangelical movement in the United Kingdom .

eos Juergen_Habermas ( born june 18 , 1929 in Düsseldorf ) is a German philosopher and sociologist in the tradition of critical theory and American pragmatism , best known for Juergen_Habermas concept of the public sphere based in Juergen_Habermas theory and pragmatics of communicative action . Juergen_Habermas work , sometimes labeled as Neo - Marxist , focuses on the foundations of social theory and epistemology ; the analysis of advanced capitalist industrial society and of democracy ; the rule of law in a critical social - evolutionary context ; and contemporary - especially German - politics .

eos Le_Corbusier , widely known as Le Corbusier ( october 6 , 1887 - august 27 , 1965 ) , was a French Swiss born architect , famous for Le_Corbusier contributions to what is now called modernism , or the International Style . eos Le_Corbusier was a pioneer in theoretical studies of modern design and Le_Corbusier was dedicated to providing better living conditions for the residents of crowded cities . eos Michael_Walzer ( 3 march 1935 - ) is a political theorist and writer on society , politics , and ethics currently working as a professor at the Institute for Advanced Study in Princeton , New Jersey . Michael_Walzer has written on a wide range of topics , including just and unjust wars , nationalism , ethnicity , economic justice , criticism , radicalism , tolerance , and political obligation . eos Like Sandel and MacIntyre , Michael_Walzer is not completely comfortable with this label . eos Napoleon_I_of_France , Emperor of the French , King of Italy , Mediator of the Swiss Confederation and Protector of the Confederation of the Rhine , born Napoleone di Buonaparte ( 15 august 1769 - 5 May 1821 ) , was a general during the French Revolution , the ruler of France as First Consul ( Premier Consul ) of the French Republic from 11 november 1799 to 18 May 1804 , Emperor of the French ( Empereur des Français ) under the name Napoleon I ( Napoléon 1er ) from 18 May 1804 to 6 april 1814 , and Napoleon_I_of_France was briefly restored as Emperor from 20 march to 22 june 1815 . Over the course of little more than a decade , the armies of France under
eos Over the course of little more than a decade , the armies of France under Napoleon_I_of_France command fought almost every European power , often simultaneously , and acquired control of most of continental Europe by conquest or alliance . The disastrous invasion of Russia in 1812 marked a turning point . Following the Russian campaign and the defeat at Leipzig in october 1813 ,
eos The disastrous invasion of Russia in 1812 marked a turning point . Following the Russian campaign and the defeat at Leipzig in october 1813 , Napoleon_I_of_France abdicated in april 1814 after the Allies invaded France .
eos Following the Russian campaign and the defeat at Leipzig in october 1813 , Napoleon_I_of_France abdicated in april 1814 after the Allies invaded France . Napoleon_I_of_France was exiled to the island of Elba .
eos Napoleon_I_of_France was exiled to the island of Elba . Napoleon_I_of_France staged a comeback known as the Hundred Days ( les Cent Jours ) , but Napoleon_I_of_France was defeated at Waterloo on 18 june , 1815 .

eos Neil_Young work is characterized by deeply personal lyrics , distinctive guitar work , and an almost instantly recognizable nasal tenor ( and frequently alto ) singing voice . Although Neil_Young accompanies Neil_Young on several different instruments - including piano and harmonica - Neil_Young style of hammer - on acoustic guitar and often idiosyncratic soloing on electric guitar are the lynchpins of a sometimes ragged , sometimes polished , yet consistently evocative sound . eos Neil_Young work is characterized by deeply personal lyrics , distinctive guitar work , and an almost instantly recognizable nasal tenor ( and frequently alto ) singing voice . Although Neil_Young accompanies Neil_Young on several different instruments - including piano and harmonica - Neil_Young style of hammer - on acoustic guitar and often idiosyncratic soloing on electric guitar are the lynchpins of a sometimes ragged , sometimes polished , yet consistently evocative sound . eos Nellie_McClung , ( october 20 1873 - september 1 1951 ) was a Canadian feminist , politician , and social activist .
eos Nellie_McClung , ( october 20 1873 - september 1 1951 ) was a Canadian feminist , politician , and social activist . Nellie_McClung was a part of the social and moral reform movements prevalent in Western Canada in the early 1900s .

eos The Government of Canada followed suit that same year . After moving to Edmonton , Alberta , Nellie_McClung continued the campaign for suffrage .

eos Called a crusader by some , Nellie_McClung was nevertheless a pragmatic leader Nellie_McClung put words into action . Nellie_McClung served as a Liberal member of the Legislative Assembly of Alberta from 1921 to 1926 .
eos Nellie_McClung was one of The Famous Five ( also called The Valiant Five ) , with Irene Parlby , Henrietta Muir Edwards , Emily Murphy and Louise McKinney ; who , in 1927 , put forward a petition to clarify the word ` ` Person '' in Section 24 of the British North America Act ( the Persons Case ) . On october 18 , 1929 , the Privy Council found that ` ` Person '' includes female persons , thereby making women eligible for appointment to the Canadian Senate .
eos Nellie_McClung was one of The Famous Five ( also called The Valiant Five ) , with Irene Parlby , Henrietta Muir Edwards , Emily Murphy and Louise McKinney ; who , in 1927 , put forward a petition to clarify the word ` ` Person '' in Section 24 of the British North America Act ( the Persons Case ) . On october 18 , 1929 , the Privy Council found that ` ` Person '' includes female persons , thereby making women eligible for appointment to the Canadian Senate . Nellie_McClung founded a number of organizations : the Winnipeg Political Equality League , the Federated Women 's Institutes of Canada and the Women 's Institute of Edmonton ( of which
eos On october 18 , 1929 , the Privy Council found that ` ` Person '' includes female persons , thereby making women eligible for appointment to the Canadian Senate . Nellie_McClung founded a number of organizations : the Winnipeg Political Equality League , the Federated Women 's Institutes of Canada and the Women 's Institute of Edmonton ( of which Nellie_McClung was the first president ) .
eos Nellie_McClung founded a number of organizations : the Winnipeg Political Equality League , the Federated Women 's Institutes of Canada and the Women 's Institute of Edmonton ( of which Nellie_McClung was the first president ) . eos Pierre_Trudeau PC , CC , CH , QC , MA , LLD , FRSC "" IPA : "" pjɛʀ ɛliʌt tʀydo "" "" ( october 18 , 1919 - september 28 , 2000 ) was the fifteenth Prime Minister of Canada from april 20 , 1968 to june 4 , 1979 , and from march 3 , 1980 to june 30 , 1984 .
eos Pierre_Trudeau PC , CC , CH , QC , MA , LLD , FRSC "" IPA : "" pjɛʀ ɛliʌt tʀydo "" "" ( october 18 , 1919 - september 28 , 2000 ) was the fifteenth Prime Minister of Canada from april 20 , 1968 to june 4 , 1979 , and from march 3 , 1980 to june 30 , 1984 . eos Pope_Urban_II was one of the most prominent and active supporters of the Gregorian reforms , especially as legate in Germany in 1084 , and Pope_Urban_II was among the few whom Gregory VII nominated as possible successors to be Pope . Desiderius , abbot of Monte Cassino , who became Pope Victor III ( 1086 - 87 ) was chosen Pope initially , but after his short reign Pope_Urban_II was elected Pope Urban II by acclamation ( march 1088 ) at a small meeting of cardinals and other prelates held in Terracina .
eos Desiderius , abbot of Monte Cassino , who became Pope Victor III ( 1086 - 87 ) was chosen Pope initially , but after his short reign Pope_Urban_II was elected Pope Urban II by acclamation ( march 1088 ) at a small meeting of cardinals and other prelates held in Terracina . eos Desiderius , abbot of Monte Cassino , who became Pope Victor III ( 1086 - 87 ) was chosen Pope initially , but after his short reign Pope_Urban_II was elected Pope Urban II by acclamation ( march 1088 ) at a small meeting of cardinals and other prelates held in Terracina . Pope_Urban_II took up the policies of Pope Gregory VII , and while pursuing them with determination , Pope_Urban_II showed greater flexibility , and diplomatic finesse . At the outset Pope_Urban_II had to reckon with the presence of the powerful antipope Clement III ( 1080 , 1084 - 1100 ) in Rome ; but a series of well - attended synods held in Rome , Amalfi , Benevento , and Troia supported
eos At the outset Pope_Urban_II had to reckon with the presence of the powerful antipope Clement III ( 1080 , 1084 - 1100 ) in Rome ; but a series of well - attended synods held in Rome , Amalfi , Benevento , and Troia supported Pope_Urban_II in renewed declarations against simony , lay investiture , and clerical marriages , and a continued opposition to Emperor Henry IV ( 1056 - 1105 ) . In accordance with this last policy , the marriage of the countess Matilda of Tuscany with Guelph of Bavaria was promoted , Prince Conrad was helped in his rebellion against his father and crowned King of the Romans at Milan in 1093 , and the Empress ( Adelaide or Praxedes ) encouraged in her charges against her husband . eos Preston_Manning ( born june 10 , 1942 , in Edmonton , Alberta ) , is a right - leaning populist Canadian politician .
eos Preston_Manning ( born june 10 , 1942 , in Edmonton , Alberta ) , is a right - leaning populist Canadian politician . Preston_Manning was the first and only leader of the Reform Party of Canada , a Canadian federal political party that evolved into the Canadian Alliance .
eos Preston_Manning was the first and only leader of the Reform Party of Canada , a Canadian federal political party that evolved into the Canadian Alliance . Preston_Manning sat in Parliament for this party until retirement , after which it in turn merged with the Progressive Conservative Party to form today 's Conservative Party of Canada .
eos Preston_Manning sat in Parliament for this party until retirement , after which it in turn merged with the Progressive Conservative Party to form today 's Conservative Party of Canada . Preston_Manning came from a political background :
eos Preston_Manning came from a political background : Preston_Manning was the son of Ernest Manning , Social Credit Party Premier of Alberta between 1943 and 1968 . In 1964 ,
eos Preston_Manning was the son of Ernest Manning , Social Credit Party Premier of Alberta between 1943 and 1968 . In 1964 , Preston_Manning graduated from the University of Alberta with a BA in Economics .
eos In 1964 , Preston_Manning graduated from the University of Alberta with a BA in Economics . Preston_Manning sought election to the Canadian House of Commons in the 1965 federal election as a candidate of the federal Social Credit Party , but Preston_Manning was defeated . eos Preston_Manning was elected to the House of Commons in the 1993 federal election , when Reform experienced its first major electoral success , replacing the Progressive Conservative Party as Canada 's dominant conservative party , with a base especially in Western Canada . eos With Reform 's emergence , however , Preston_Manning fragmented the conservative vote into two parts - Reform and the weakened PC Party . With Canada 's plurality voting system , the result was political domination by the Liberal Party . Consequently ,

eos The movement resulted in the formation of a new party , the Canadian Alliance , which as its full name ( Canadian Reform Conservative Alliance ) shows , was intended to supplant both parties . eos 260 BCE - september 10 , 210 BCE ) , personal name Zheng , was king of the Chinese State of Qin from 247 BCE to 221 BCE , and then the first emperor of a unified China from 221 BCE to 210 BCE , ruling under the name First Emperor . Having unified China , Qin_Shi_Huang and Qin_Shi_Huang prime minister Lǐ Sī passed a series of major reforms aimed at cementing the unification , and they undertook some gigantic construction projects , most notably the precursor version of the current Great Wall of China . eos Rene_Descartes was a major figure in 17th century continental rationalism , later advocated by Baruch Spinoza and Gottfried Leibniz , and opposed by the empiricist school of thought , consisting of Hobbes , Locke , Berkeley , and Hume . Leibniz , Spinoza and Rene_Descartes were all versed in mathematics as well as philosophy , and Rene_Descartes and Leibniz contributed greatly to science as well . eos As the inventor of the Cartesian coordinate system , Rene_Descartes founded analytic geometry , that bridge between algebra and geometry crucial to the invention of the calculus and analysis . Rene_Descartes reflections on mind and mechanism began the strain of western thought that much later , impelled by the invention of the electronic computer and by the possibility of machine intelligence , blossomed into , eg , the Turing test .

eos Richard_Dawkins first came to prominence with Richard_Dawkins 1976 book The Selfish Gene which popularised the gene - centric view of evolution and introduced the term meme into the lexicon , thereby helping to found the field of memetics . In 1982 , Richard_Dawkins made a major contribution to the science of evolution with the theory , presented in Richard_Dawkins widely cited book The Extended Phenotype , that phenotypic effects are not limited to an organism 's body but can stretch far into the environment , including into the bodies of other organisms .

eos Robert_Falcon_Scott ( 6 june 1868 - 29 march 1912 ) was a Royal Naval officer and Antarctic explorer . eos Robert_Putnam ( born january 9 , 1941 in Rochester , New York ) is a political scientist and professor at Harvard University , well - known for Robert_Putnam writings on civic engagement , civil society , and social capital .

Robert_Putnam also developed the influential two - level game theory that assumes international agreements will only be successfully brokered if they also result in domestic benefits .
eos Robert_Putnam also developed the influential two - level game theory that assumes international agreements will only be successfully brokered if they also result in domestic benefits . Robert_Putnam most famous ( and controversial ) work , Bowling Alone , argues that the United States has undergone an unprecedented collapse in civic , social , associational , and political life ( social capital ) since the 1960s , with serious negative consequences . eos Robert_Putnam also developed the influential two - level game theory that assumes international agreements will only be successfully brokered if they also result in domestic benefits . eos Robert_Putnam most famous ( and controversial ) work , Bowling Alone , argues that the United States has undergone an unprecedented collapse in civic , social , associational , and political life ( social capital ) since the 1960s , with serious negative consequences . Though Robert_Putnam measured this decline in data of many varieties , Robert_Putnam most striking point was that virtually every traditional civic , social and fraternal organization - typified by bowling leagues - had undergone a massive decline in membership while the number of people bowling increased drastically .

eos Socrates was born and lived in Athens , where Socrates spent most of Socrates time in enthusiastic pursuit of wisdom ( philosophy ) . Socrates ` ` followed the argument '' in Socrates personal reflection , and in a sustained and rigorous dialogue between friends , followers , and contemporary itinerant teachers of wisdom . Later in Socrates life
eos Socrates ` ` followed the argument '' in Socrates personal reflection , and in a sustained and rigorous dialogue between friends , followers , and contemporary itinerant teachers of wisdom . Later in Socrates life Socrates became known as the wisest man in all of Greece . Opinions about

eos Steven_Pinker ( born september 18 1954 , in Montreal , Canada ) is a prominent American experimental psychologist , cognitive scientist , and popular science writer known for Steven_Pinker spirited and wide - ranging advocacy of evolutionary psychology and the computational theory of mind . Steven_Pinker academic specializations are visual cognition and language development in children , and Steven_Pinker is most famous for popularising the idea that language is an ` ` instinct '' or biological adaptation shaped by natural selection rather than a by - product of general intelligence .

Thomas_More shares Thomas_More feast day , june 22 on the Catholic calendar of saints , with Saint John Fisher , the only Bishop during the English reformation to maintain his allegiance to the Pope .

eos Tim_Horton played 24 seasons in the National Hockey League for the Toronto Maple Leafs , New York Rangers , Pittsburgh Penguins and Buffalo Sabres . eos Accordingly , Amazon_River is sometimes known as The River Sea . Amazon_River is also generally regarded by most geographic authorities as being the second longest river on Earth ( the longest being the Nile in Africa ) . The drainage area of
eos The drainage area of Amazon_River in Brazil , called the Amazon Basin , is the largest of any river system . If the Basin were an independent country , it would be the world 's seventh largest , having more than twice the area of India ( which actually does rank seventh ) . eos If the Basin were an independent country , it would be the world 's seventh largest , having more than twice the area of India ( which actually does rank seventh ) . eos The quantity of fresh water released by Amazon_River to the Atlantic Ocean is enormous : up to 300,000 m ³ per second in the rainy season . Indeed , Amazon_River is responsible for a fifth of the total volume of fresh water entering the oceans worldwide . It is said that offshore of the mouth of
eos It is said that offshore of the mouth of Amazon_River potable water can be drawn from the ocean while still out of sight of the coastline , and the salinity of the ocean is notably lower a hundred miles out to sea . eos Colorado_River is a river in the southwestern United States and northwestern Mexico , approximately 1,450 mi ( 2,330 km ) long , draining a part of the arid regions on the western slope of the Rocky Mountains . The natural course of Colorado_River flows into the Gulf of California , but the heavy use of Colorado_River as an irrigation source for Imperial Valley has desiccated the lower course of Colorado_River in Mexico such that Colorado_River no longer consistently reaches the sea .
eos The natural course of Colorado_River flows into the Gulf of California , but the heavy use of Colorado_River as an irrigation source for Imperial Valley has desiccated the lower course of Colorado_River in Mexico such that Colorado_River no longer consistently reaches the sea . Colorado_River drains 242,900 sq mi ( 629,100 km ² ) . Total flows of
eos Colorado_River drains 242,900 sq mi ( 629,100 km ² ) . Total flows of Colorado_River range from 20,000 cubic feet per second ( 570 m ³ / s ) in droughts to 1,000,000 ft ³ / s ( 28,000 m ³ / s ) in severe floods . With the construction of massive power dams on the lower course of
eos Total flows of Colorado_River range from 20,000 cubic feet per second ( 570 m ³ / s ) in droughts to 1,000,000 ft ³ / s ( 28,000 m ³ / s ) in severe floods . eos Colorado_River_Texas is the 18th longest river in the United States .
eos Colorado_River_Texas is the 18th longest river in the United States . Colorado_River_Texas flows generally southeast from Dawson County through Marble Falls , Austin , Bastrop , Smithville , La Grange , Columbus , and Bay City before emptying into the Gulf of Mexico at Matagorda Bay . eos Colorado_River_Texas flows generally southeast from Dawson County through Marble Falls , Austin , Bastrop , Smithville , La Grange , Columbus , and Bay City before emptying into the Gulf of Mexico at Matagorda Bay . It is this confusion as well as an alleged mapping error that is believed to have led to Colorado_River_Texas misnaming .
eos It is this confusion as well as an alleged mapping error that is believed to have led to Colorado_River_Texas misnaming . Colorado_River_Texas is an important source of water for farming , cities , and electrical power production . Major man - made reservoirs on
eos Major man - made reservoirs on Colorado_River_Texas include Lake Marble Falls , Lake Buchanan , Inks Lake , Lake LBJ , Lake Travis , Lake Austin , and Town Lake in Austin . Collectively , these lakes are known as the Highland Lakes . In addition to power plants operating on each of the major lakes , waters of
eos Collectively , these lakes are known as the Highland Lakes . In addition to power plants operating on each of the major lakes , waters of Colorado_River_Texas are used for cooling the South Texas Nuclear Project , near Bay City . Flood control and use of
eos In addition to power plants operating on each of the major lakes , waters of Colorado_River_Texas are used for cooling the South Texas Nuclear Project , near Bay City . Flood control and use of Colorado_River_Texas is managed by three agencies established by the Texas Legislature , the Upper Colorado River Authority , Central Colorado River Authority , and Lower Colorado River Authority . eos Columbia_River ( French : fleuve Columbia ) is a river situated in British Columbia and the Pacific Northwest of the United States .
eos Columbia_River ( French : fleuve Columbia ) is a river situated in British Columbia and the Pacific Northwest of the United States . Columbia_River is the largest river in volume flowing into the Pacific Ocean from the Western Hemisphere , and Columbia_River is the second largest by volume in North America behind the Mississippi . eos Danube ( ancient Danuvius , ancient Greek Ἴστρος Istros ) is the longest river of the European Union and Europe 's second - longest ( after the Volga ) .
eos Danube ( ancient Danuvius , ancient Greek Ἴστρος Istros ) is the longest river of the European Union and Europe 's second - longest ( after the Volga ) . Danube originates in the Black Forest in Germany as two smaller rivers - the Brigach and the Breg - which join at Donaueschingen , and it is from here that
eos Danube ( ancient Danuvius , ancient Greek Ἴστρος Istros ) is the longest river of the European Union and Europe 's second - longest ( after the Volga ) . Danube originates in the Black Forest in Germany as two smaller rivers - the Brigach and the Breg - which join at Donaueschingen , and it is from here that Danube is known as the Danube , flowing generally eastwards for a distance of some 2850 km ( 1771 miles ) , passing through several Central and Eastern European capitals , before emptying into the Black Sea via the Danube Delta in Romania .
eos Danube ( ancient Danuvius , ancient Greek Ἴστρος Istros ) is the longest river of the European Union and Europe 's second - longest ( after the Volga ) . Danube originates in the Black Forest in Germany as two smaller rivers - the Brigach and the Breg - which join at Donaueschingen , and it is from here that Danube is known as the Danube , flowing generally eastwards for a distance of some 2850 km ( 1771 miles ) , passing through several Central and Eastern European capitals , before emptying into the Black Sea via the Danube Delta in Romania . Danube has been an important international waterway for centuries , as
eos Danube originates in the Black Forest in Germany as two smaller rivers - the Brigach and the Breg - which join at Donaueschingen , and it is from here that Danube is known as the Danube , flowing generally eastwards for a distance of some 2850 km ( 1771 miles ) , passing through several Central and Eastern European capitals , before emptying into the Black Sea via the Danube Delta in Romania . Danube has been an important international waterway for centuries , as Danube remains today . Known to history as one of the long - standing frontiers of the Roman Empire ,
eos Danube has been an important international waterway for centuries , as Danube remains today . Known to history as one of the long - standing frontiers of the Roman Empire , Danube flows through - or Danube forms a part of the borders of - ten countries : Germany , Austria , Slovakia , Hungary , Croatia , Serbia , Bulgaria , Romania , Moldova , and Ukraine ; in addition , the drainage basin includes parts of ten more countries : Italy , Poland , Switzerland , Czech Republic , Slovenia , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Montenegro , Republic of Macedonia , Moldova , and Albania . eos Gambia_River is a major river in Africa , running 1,130 km ( 700 miles ) from the Fouta Djallon plateau in north Guinea westward to the Atlantic Ocean at the city of Banjul .

eos Sengge Chu ( ` Lion River ' ) ; Persian : Hindu ; Greek : Sinthos ; Pashto : Abaseen ( ` ` The Father of Rivers '' ) ; Mehran ( an older name ) ) is the longest and most important river in Pakistan . Originating in the Tibetan plateau in the vicinity of Lake Mansarovar , Indus_River runs a course through Jammu and Kashmir in both India and Northern Areas in Pakistan , and in a southernly direction along the entire length of India to merge into the Arabian Sea near the city of Karachi . eos Narmada_River or Nerbudda is a river in central India in Indian subcontinent .

eos Narmada_River forms the traditional boundary between North India and South India , and Narmada_River is a total of 1,289 km ( 801 mi ) long . Narmada_River is one of only three major rivers in pensinsular India that run from east to west , along with the Tapti and the Mahi river .

eos Narmada_River is the only river in India Narmada_River flows in a rift valley . Narmada_River rises on the summit of Amarkantak Hill in Madhya Pradesh state , and for the first 320 kilometres ( 200 miles ) of Narmada_River course Narmada_River winds among the Mandla Hills , which form the head of the Satpura Range ; then at Jabalpur , passing through the ` Marble Rocks ' , Narmada_River enters the Narmada Valley between the Vindhya and Satpura ranges , and Narmada_River pursues a direct westerly course to the Gulf of Cambay .
eos Narmada_River flows through the states of Madhya Pradesh , Maharashtra , and Gujarat , and Narmada_River empties into the Arabian Sea in the Bharuch District of Gujarat . The Narmada Valley is a graben , a layered block of the earth 's crust that dropped down relative to the blocks on either side due to ancient spreading of the earth 's crust . Two normal faults , known as the Narmada North fault and Narmada South fault , parallel
eos The Narmada Valley is a graben , a layered block of the earth 's crust that dropped down relative to the blocks on either side due to ancient spreading of the earth 's crust . Two normal faults , known as the Narmada North fault and Narmada South fault , parallel Narmada_River course , and mark the boundary between the Narmada block and the Vindhya and Satpura blocks or horsts which rose relative to the Narmada Graben .
eos The Narmada valley is considered extremely important for paleontological studies in India . Several dinosaur fossils have been found in the area including Titanosaurus indicus found in 1877 by Richard Lydekker and the recently discovered Rajasaurus narmadensis .

eos Niger_River is the principal river of western Africa , extending over 2500 miles ( about 4000 km ) .
eos Niger_River is the principal river of western Africa , extending over 2500 miles ( about 4000 km ) . Niger_River runs in a crescent through Guinea , Mali , Niger , on the border with Benin and then through Nigeria , discharging through a massive delta , known as the Oil Rivers , into the Gulf of Guinea .
eos Niger_River runs in a crescent through Guinea , Mali , Niger , on the border with Benin and then through Nigeria , discharging through a massive delta , known as the Oil Rivers , into the Gulf of Guinea . Niger_River is the third longest river in Africa , exceeded only by the Nile and the Congo River ( also known as the Zaïre River ) .

eos Nile ( "" Arabic : النيل "" , "" Arabic transliteration : an - nīl "" , Ancient Egyptian iteru ) is a major north - flowing river in Africa , often regarded as the longest river on Earth , although some sources claim the Amazon in South America is longer .
eos Nile ( "" Arabic : النيل "" , "" Arabic transliteration : an - nīl "" , Ancient Egyptian iteru ) is a major north - flowing river in Africa , often regarded as the longest river on Earth , although some sources claim the Amazon in South America is longer . Nile has two major tributaries , the White Nile and Blue Nile , the latter being the source of most of
eos The White Nile rises in the Great Lakes region of central Africa , with the most distant source in southern Rwanda 2 ° 16 ' 55.92 S , 29 ° 19 ' 52.32 E , and flows north from there through Tanzania , Lake Victoria , Uganda and southern Sudan , while the Blue Nile starts at Lake Tana in Ethiopia , flowing into Sudan from the southeast . The two rivers meet near the Sudanese capital Khartoum . The northern section of
eos The White Nile rises in the Great Lakes region of central Africa , with the most distant source in southern Rwanda 2 ° 16 ' 55.92 S , 29 ° 19 ' 52.32 E , and flows north from there through Tanzania , Lake Victoria , Uganda and southern Sudan , while the Blue Nile starts at Lake Tana in Ethiopia , flowing into Sudan from the southeast . The two rivers meet near the Sudanese capital Khartoum . The northern section of Nile flows almost entirely through desert , from Sudan into Egypt , a country whose civilization has depended on
eos The two rivers meet near the Sudanese capital Khartoum . The northern section of Nile flows almost entirely through desert , from Sudan into Egypt , a country whose civilization has depended on Nile since ancient times . Most of the population of Egypt and all of its cities , with the exception of those near the coast , lie along those parts of the Nile valley north of Aswan ; and nearly all the cultural and historical sites of Ancient Egypt are found along the banks of
eos The northern section of Nile flows almost entirely through desert , from Sudan into Egypt , a country whose civilization has depended on Nile since ancient times . Most of the population of Egypt and all of its cities , with the exception of those near the coast , lie along those parts of the Nile valley north of Aswan ; and nearly all the cultural and historical sites of Ancient Egypt are found along the banks of Nile .

eos Parana_River ( Río Paraná in Spanish , Rio Paraná in Portuguese ) is a river in south central South America , running through Brazil , Paraguay and Argentina over a course of some 2,570 kilometers ( 1,600 miles ) . This length increases to 3,998 km ( 2,484 miles ) if the distance is counted from the headwaters of the Paranaiba River in Brazil .

eos Vistula has Vistula source in the south of the country , at Barania Góra ( 1220 m high ) in the Beskidy Mountains where Vistula starts with the White Little Vistula ( Biała Wisełka ) and the Black Little Vistula ( Czarna Wisełka ) . eos Cháng Jiāng "" ) listen is the longest river in Asia and the third longest in the world after the Nile in Africa and the Amazon in South America . Yangtze_River is about 6,211 km long and Yangtze_River flows from Yangtze_River source in Qinghai Province in western China , eastwards into the East China Sea .

eos Yellow_River ( "" Traditional Chinese : 黃河 , Simplified Chinese : 黄河 , Pinyin : Huáng Hélisten , Wade - Giles : Hwang - ho "" , sometimes simply called the River in ancient Chinese ) is the second longest river in China ( after Yangtze River ) and the fifth in the world .
eos Hwang - ho "" , sometimes simply called the River in ancient Chinese ) is the second longest river in China ( after Yangtze River ) and the fifth in the world . Yellow_River is 5464 km long . Originated from the Bayankala Mountains in Qinghai Province in western China ,
eos Originated from the Bayankala Mountains in Qinghai Province in western China , Yellow_River flows through nine provinces of China and Yellow_River finally empties into the Bohai Sea . eos The middle stream of Yellow_River passes through Loess Plateau with substantial erosion taking place . The large amount of mud and sand discharged into Yellow_River makes Yellow_River the most sediment - laden river in the world . The recorded highest annual level of silts discharged into
eos The recorded highest annual level of silts discharged into Yellow_River is 3.91 billion tons ( 1933 ) . Highest silt concentration level is recorded in 1977 with 920 kg / m ³ . These sediments later deposit in the slower lower reaches of
eos Highest silt concentration level is recorded in 1977 with 920 kg / m ³ . These sediments later deposit in the slower lower reaches of Yellow_River , elevating the river bed and creating the famous ` ` river above ground '' . In Kaifeng ,
eos These sediments later deposit in the slower lower reaches of Yellow_River , elevating the river bed and creating the famous ` ` river above ground '' . In Kaifeng , Yellow_River is forty meters above the ground level .
eos Yellow_River is called the ` ` Mother River of China '' and ` ` the Cradle of Chinese Civilization '' in China , as the Yellow River basin is the birth - place of the northern Chinese civilizations and the most prosperous region in the early Chinese history . eos Yukon_River is a major watercourse of northwestern North America . Over half of Yukon_River lies in the US state of Alaska , with the other portion lying in and giving Yukon_River name to Canada 's Yukon Territory .
eos The total drainage area is 832,700 km ² ( 321,500 mi ² ) , of which 323,800 km ² ( 126,300 mi ² ) is in Canada . By comparison , the total area is more than 25 % larger than Texas or Alberta . The longest river in Alaska and the Yukon Territory ,
eos By comparison , the total area is more than 25 % larger than Texas or Alberta . The longest river in Alaska and the Yukon Territory , Yukon_River was one of the principal means of transportation during the 1896 - 1903 Klondike Gold Rush . Paddle - wheel riverboats continued to ply
eos Paddle - wheel riverboats continued to ply Yukon_River until the 1950s , when the Klondike Highway was completed . Yukon means ` ` great river '' in Gwich ` in .
